text: Shitao (, – 1707), born Zhu Ruoji (), was a Chinese , calligrapher, painter and of the early Qing dynasty."Shitao" on the Encyclopædia Britannica online. Archived 12 November 2022 Alongside , he was one of China's most famous painters of the early Qing dynsasty. ==References== Category:1642 births Category:1707 deaths Category:17th-century Chinese painters Category:18th- century Chinese people
